name: elevate-sports-app
description: Wrap the needed tools required to cook Elevate desktop and web extension

scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix && cd ./appcore/ && npm audit fix && cd ../desktop/ && npm audit fix && cd ../webextension/ && npm audit fix
scripts.clean: node ./node_modules/del-cli/cli.js ./dist/ ./package/ && cd ./desktop/ && npm run clean && cd ../webextension/ && npm run clean
scripts.validate:desktop: npm run type:check:desktop && npm run clean && cd ./appcore/ && npm test && cd ../desktop/ && npm test && npm run build:prod
scripts.postinstall: cd webextension/ && npm install && cd ../appcore/ && npm install && cd ../desktop/ && npm install
scripts.test: npm run clean && cd ./desktop/ && npm test && cd ../appcore/ && npm test && cd ../webextension/ && npm test
scripts.type:check:desktop: cd ./appcore/ && npm run type:check && cd ../desktop/ && npm run type:check
scripts.type:check:extension: cd ./appcore/ && npm run type:check && cd ../webextension/ && npm run type:check
scripts.wipe: npm run clean && npm run wipe:package-locks && npm run wipe:node-modules
